channel.title: Rashmi Sirdeshpande on
channel.description: Recent content in Rashmi Sirdeshpande on

item.title: Amazing Asia
item.description: A great “explain it like I’m 5” primer that more people beyond the age of 5 could appreciate. It’s more thorough, interesting, and engaging than anything I learned in school, that’s for sure. ARC kindly provided by the publisher via NetGalley in exchange for an honest review.
